sentences.en: ...a country of nomads who raise cattle and camels.
sentences.cn: ...一个饲养牛和骆驼的游牧国家。

sentences.en: A nomad in the desert, living on the daily dew.
sentences.cn: 沙漠中的流浪者, 靠著每天的露水过生活.

sentences.en: Baseball ultimate nomad is looking to finally set down some roots.
sentences.cn: 棒球浪人终于想要定下来了.

sentences.en: He was a patriarchal Semitic nomad.
sentences.cn: 他是族长制闪米特游牧部落的一员.

sentences.en: He was indeed a nomad of no nationality.
sentences.cn: 他的确是个无国籍的游民.

sentences.en: I think these devices facilitate our inner digital nomad.
sentences.cn: 我认为这些设备丰富了我们的数字生活.

sentences.en: Shaman and Chieftain now found in Nomad encounters.
sentences.cn: 在大地图也可以遇到僧人和酋长了?

sentences.en: The bug showing multiple nomad invasions warn has been fixed.
sentences.cn: 表现侵犯警告的多样游牧民族的虫已经被修理.

sentences.en: The nomad existence of the Gypsies is a mystery to a lot of ordinary people.
sentences.cn: 对大多数普通人来说,吉普赛人的流浪生活充满了神秘的色彩.

sentences.en: The nomad life is rough and hazardous.
Yes, the Nomad will be able to build multiple stationary defenses.
sentences.cn: 是的, 游牧者将能够建立多种自动炮塔.

trans.tran_cn: 游牧民，流浪者，游牧生活，流浪生活
trans.tran_en: a member of a tribe that travels from place to place instead of living in one place all the time, usually in order to find grass for their animals
